"Mamiya": "Alright, here's the deal. First, it's about the Trainia..."
"We know that Kvaris natives from long ago made use of 'em. But go figure, they weren't the ones who made the Cocoons or the Towers, it seems."
"For example, the Photon transfer devices. You know, the things that warp you around in the Trainia. The Ryuker Devices use similar technology."
"Apparently, Kvaris used to be known for their technological advancement."
"...but not enough to be able to actually build those things, it seems."
"...So if they didn't make the Trainia, then who did?"
"Actually... There's been a hypothesis floating around the scientific community. It's still full of uncertainties, so we haven't been able to go public with it yet."
"In order to test the hypothesis, I'm gonna need you to get me as much data as you can."
"Like, data from all of the Cocoons. Yeah I know, I know it's a tall order, but I could really use your help. Please?"
